WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting, we've fixed a lot of these issues in the current develop branch.
WorkItem.Description:
I noticed an error on the console while working with the Playground - it says to "file a bug against TypeScript", so I'm reporting it:

    ERROR updating language service (file a bug against TypeScript) editor.main.js:20
    e.onmessage editor.main.js:20
    (anonymous function) editor.main.js:19
    worker.onmessage editor.main.js:19
    Object {stack: Array[11], message: "TypeError: Cannot read property 'flags' of undefined"}
    message: "TypeError: Cannot read property 'flags' of undefined"
    stack: Array[11]
    0: "TypeError: Cannot read property 'flags' of undefined"
    1: "    at n.emitFunction (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:120:18915)"
    2: "    at n.emit (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:134:754)"
    3: "    at n.emitWorker (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:133:26854)"
    4: "    at n.t.emit (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:133:19627)"
    5: "    at n.emitJavascript (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:120:29487)"
    6: "    at n.emitCommaSeparatedList (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:120:26905)"
    7: "    at n.emitObjectLiteral (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:120:6160)"
    8: "    at n.emitWorker (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:133:23409)"
    9: "    at n.t.emit (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:133:19627)"
    10: "    at n.emitVariableDeclarator (http://www.typescriptlang.org/Script/vs/languages/typescript/lib/typescriptServices.js:120:21581)"

I'm using Chrome 31.0.1650.48 beta-m.
